name: 建造綠色工作坊 – 碳足跡桌遊: 碳行棋跡 Carbon Footprint Adventure Board Game
location: 建造業零碳天地 CIC - Zero Carbon Park, 常悅道8號 8 Sheung Yuet Road 九龍灣, KOW
about: 建造綠色工作坊 – 碳足跡桌遊: 碳行棋跡日期 : 2025年7月27日 (星期日)地點 : 香港九龍灣常悅道8號建造業零碳天地多用途會堂時間 : 下午2時正至3時30分活動長度 : 90分鐘名額 : 20名參加資格 : 8歲或以上(12歲以下需由成人陪同，一個名額只限1位家長陪同)報名費用 : $20*已繳付之相關費用，在任何情況之下(包括未能出席該活動) 將不被退回。工作坊若因任何情況需要取消或改期，零碳天地將另行通知相關安排。*有關網上預約登記之查詢,請致電: 2100 9800 (星期一至日 上午9時至下午6時)*相關資料必須準確並用於網上預約登記。Construction Green Workshop – Carbon Footprint Adventure Board GameDate:27 July 2025 (Sunday)Venue : Multi-purpose Hall, CIC-Zero Carbon Park, 8 Sheung Yuet Road, Kowloon BayTime : 2:00pm - 3:30pmDuration: 90minsQuota: 20paxEligibility: Aged 8 or above(Aged under 12 shall be accompanied by an adult. 1 quota allows 1 child and 1 adult)Registration Fee : $20*No refunds on workshop fees paid will be made (including absentee ) under any circumstances . Participants will be notified of further arrangement should the workshop be rescheduled or cancelled .*Enquiries regarding online registration, please contact 2100 9800 (Mon-Sun 9am-6pm)*Accurate participant ’s details for registration is required.備註 Remarks1. 按此閱讀有關此節目與活動條款及細則和相關之收集個人資料聲明。Please click and read the Terms & Conditions for Activities and Events and the Personal Information Collection Statement.2. 建造業零碳天地由零碳天地以建造業零碳天地之名義擁有及營運。CIC-Zero Carbon Park is owned and operated by Zero Carbon Building, trading as CIC-ZCP.3. 建造綠色工作坊 – 碳足跡桌遊: 碳行棋跡「活動」由零碳天地主辦「主辦單位」。Construction Green Workshop – Carbon Footprint Adventure Board Game ("the Event") is organized by Zero Carbon Building ("ZCB").4. 工作坊名額有限，報名以先到先得的方式分配，額滿即止。The Event is on a first-come, first-serve basis due to limited quota.5. 工作坊將不提供圍裙，如有需要請自備圍裙，以免衣物染污。No apron is provided in the workshop. Please bring your own one if needed to protect your clothes.6. 參加者須具備良好的身體健康狀況，並聲明自願參加是次活動和願意承擔自身的意外風險及責任。Participants shall be physically fit. Participants shall declare to participate the Event voluntarily and entirely at his/her own risk and responsibility.7. 參加者須遵守所有由主辦單位提出之活動規例及當日之臨時安排及決定。Participants shall accept and follow the Terms & Conditions for Activities and Events, and all other rules and regulations which may be adopted by the Organizer on the day of the Event.8. 如有任何爭議，零碳天地擁有最終決定權。Regarding any dispute arising from the Workshop, the decision of ZCB shall be final and binding.9. 本條款的中英文版本如有歧義，概以英文版本為準。In case of any inconsistency between the English and Chinese versions of these terms and conditions, the English version shall prevail.10 . 建造業零碳天地將會於活動期間拍攝或錄影以作紀錄，所拍攝的相片或影片之擁有權歸建造業議會及零碳天地所有。所有參加者須同意建造業零碳天地可能使用所拍攝的相片或影片作公開展示或宣傳用途而不作另行通知。CIC-Zero Carbon Park will take photos or videos during the events for recording purposes. The ownership of photos or videos belongs to the Construction Industry Council and CIC-Zero Carbon Park. All participants must agree that the photos or videos taken may be used for public display or promotion purposes without further notice.11. 若天文台於工作坊開始前4小時內發出黑色暴雨警告信號/八號或以上熱帶氣旋警告，工作坊將改期。若惡劣天氣警告在工作坊開始前4小時或更早取消，工作坊將如常舉行。If the Hong Kong Observatory issues a Black Rainstorm Warning Signal or a Typhoon Warning Signal No. 8 or above within 4 hours before the workshop starts, the workshop will be rescheduled. However, if these adverse weather warnings are canceled 4 hours or more before the workshop begins, the workshop will proceed as scheduled.

Otherwise, we do not issue refunds or exchanges after the payment is made, so please make your purchase with this in mind. If you are no longer able to attend your workshop, you are welcome to find another person to take your seat. Please just make sure to inform us of the name change on the booking by emailing lucy.make.and.do.hk@gmail.com. Places are limited and will be allocated on a first come, first serve basis. Thank you for your understanding.

about: 呢個課程會教你掌握Cricut Joy 既操作技巧包括以下內容：Cricut Design Space基本操作切割繪畫製作賀卡多層設計單色膠貼熱轉印到布製品而且完成課程後，還可享有*$120買機折扣優惠！*優惠需於上完課堂後一個月內使用。*不能和其他優惠同時使用。如對此課程或預約上有任何查詢，請電郵至：support@steamaker.hkIn this class, We will show you how to handle the cricut machine basic function.Skill like :Basic routineCuttingDrawingCard makingMulti-layered Vinyl ProjectHeat transfer to fabricA HKD120 discount is given for any machine purchase with Sprintec Asia Ltd.This offer is valid within one-month from the issue date of this receipt.This offer cannot be redeemed with other promotional offersIf you want to make a booking ,please email to us : support@steamaker.hk

name: Candle-Making Workshop (Kids & Adults)
location: Hiraya Scent & Co. PMQ, 35號 Aberdeen Street S412, 4th Floor, Block A Hong Kong, HKI
about: Learn the basics of candle making and let your creativity run wild with our selection of scents, unique marbling technique and selection of crystal chips.As a cherry on top - this workshop comes with complimentary, celebratory drinks once the candle has been poured and is solidifying. Wine not?More on the experience:We start with an exploration of scents where you are can select your pick of 2 or 3 fragrances to blend together in order to create your own signature scents. This is followed by the basics of candle making where we calculate oil to wax ratios in which we also discuss the properties of our sustainable and non-toxic Coconut Apricot Wax and Luxury Fragrance Oils.We then get to the exciting part where you get to choose your design, be it a solid color candle in 7 color options or a multi-color marbled design. This part is completely DIY so you can let your creativity lead you. Our experienced host(s) will assist you when you need it of course!Once the candles are poured, complimentary mulled wine or mulled wine tea will be served. You can then sit back and relax and watch our candle experts design your candle tops as you like it or for the brave souls - give it a go yourself!Optional DIY labels will be offered too. But if you're too mesmerised by your gorgeous marbling design, feel free to opt out!

name: Cricut Mug Press : DIY 印杯體驗班
location: Ko Fai Industrial Building, B3, 2/F, BLK B, KO FAI IND BLDG, 7 KO FAI ROAD YAU TONG, KOW
about: Cricut Mug Press：DIY印杯體驗班呢個體驗班會同你一齊做2隻熱轉印陶瓷杯。體驗內容：* Cricut Design Space (CDS) (電腦版）基本操作 * 熱昇華轉印* 使用Infusible ink「熱昇華筆」或「熱昇華轉印紙」設計簡單圖案，制作轉印模紙* 熱轉印到陶瓷杯（利用 Cricut Mug Press)於完成體驗課程後一個月內去 Sprintec Asia Ltd 購買 Cricut Mug Press 可享有 9折優惠！ 同時可以優惠價享受一次自助印杯服務（原價$98，六折後價格：$58；包物料）如需預約或有任何查詢，請用以下方式聯絡我們：* 電郵：support@steamaker.hk* 電話：2311 3189* WhatsApp : 9349 4734_________________________________________________________________亦有提供各類學校STEM課程：https://www.steamaker.hk/blogCricut產品詳情：https://zh.sprintec-asia.com/cricut---------------------------------------Forget those boring mugs, have fun making your own  About this event:  Cricut Mug Press™: DIY Sublimation Printing Experience  We will guide you through decorating 2 mugs using Infusible Ink™ [sublimation ink].  This class would teach you:  * How to perform basic operations on Cricut Design Space (CDS) (PC Ver.)   * What is sublimation printing  * How to make a transfer paper, using Infusible Ink™ Pens and/or Infusible Ink™ Transfer Sheets, for your design  * Print the mug (with the help of Cricut Mug Press™)  Within 1 month after your class, you may enjoy 10% off for Cricut Mug Press™. Meanwhile, you may also enjoy DIY Mug Printing service ONCE at a discount (Originally $98, now 40% off: $58; including materials)  For an appointment or further inquiries, please contact us through: * Email：support@steamaker.hk * Phone：2311 3189 * WhatsApp : 9349 4734  _________________________________________________________________ Cricut Products: https://www.steamaker.hk/blog  We also provide STEM courses for schools/organizations: https://www.steamaker.hk/blog

name: Basic Plant Specimen Workshop
location: Dream Impact 夢創成真, 4/F, 760 Cheung Sha Wan Road #Unit C Lai Chi Kok, KOW
about: Herbaria are at the core of botanical research, serving as permanent archives of invaluable plant information crucial for biodiversity, ecology, biogeography, evolution, conservation, and restoration efforts. Within each herbarium lies thousands to millions of preserved plant specimens, each carrying its own scientific significance, history, and natural beauty.But have you ever wondered what exactly a herbarium is, how it’s organized, or how these specimens are made?In collaboration with Encompass HK and Pi Lab Limited, this hands-on workshop offers an introduction to the fundamentals of botany and plant specimen preparation. Guided by experts, you’ll have the unique opportunity to create your very own herbarium specimen—perfect to display at home or gift to loved ones—while discovering how science and artistry come together in this timeless practice.The definition and purpose of a herbariumThe scientific and ecological importance of herbarium specimensMethods of collecting and preserving plant specimensCharacteristics of a high-quality specimenHow to document plants and their natural habitatsBasic principles of plant identificationKey features of Hong Kong’s major plant familiesTechniques for distinguishing native from exotic plantsHow Hong Kong’s native plant checklist is continually updatedThe significance of botanical Latin and scientific plant namesJoin us for an inspiring afternoon that blends science, nature, and creativity—perfect for plant enthusiasts and curious minds alike!Remarks: Individuals with allergies to camphor or G6PD deficiency are advised not to participate in the workshop due to safety concerns.

name: 2025 Hong Kong Law Fair
location: Hall 5G, Hong Kong Convention and Exhibition Centre, 1  Expo Drive Wan Chai, HKI
about: Welcome to the 2025 Hong Kong Law Fair!Meet over 50 leading law firms, professional legal organisations and law schools in Hong Kong - all gathered under one roof to offer you insights, guidance, and opportunities to connect with the legal profession.This is your chance to ask questions, explore career paths, and build networks that matter.Free admission is offered to penultimate LLB, double law degree and JD students. Law students from other years are also welcome to register for free admission, but is subject to availability.Non-law and LLM students are welcome to attend with a registration fee of HKD 500, and admission is subject to a quota.Registration is required to attend, and successful registrants will receive a QR code before the event.We look forward to seeing you at Hall 5G, Hong Kong Convention and Exhibition Centre!*In the event of adverse weather conditions (e.g. T8 or above, or a Black Rainstorm Signal), the Law Fair Committee will consider rescheduling the event to Sunday, 7 September 2025, subject to venue availability. Further details will be announced if this occurs.

name: GENAI Summit
location: The Wave, 4 Hing Yip Street 10th Floor Kwun Tong, KOW
about: THE BIGGEST GENAI EVENT IN HONG KONG STARTS SOON, DONT MISS OUT香港 GenAI Summit是一項在香港舉辦的頂尖科技盛會，旨在匯聚香港本地的商界領袖與人工智能 (AI)創新者，提供一個重要的交流與合作平台，讓您深入了解及探索生成式 AI (Generative AI) 在各行各業的實際應用。The GenAI Summit is a cutting-edge event held in Hong Kong bringing together business leaders and AI Innovators in Hong Kong under one roof, the chance to explore real world applications and apply them to your business.GenAI Summit is your one-stop destination to explore the future of enterprise and consumer AI creative solutions, the place to be for Generative AI & Digital Transformations.Brilliant minds converging to explore cutting-edge advancements, from machine learning breakthroughs to real-world AI creative applications. You’ll dive into thought-provoking talks from industry leaders that inspire bold ideas, while networking sessions connect you with innovators, collaborators, and mentors in the AI space.#Artificial intelligenceWHAT TO EXPECTAI IN REAL WORLD APPLICATIONSINDUSTRY LEADERS IN GEN AIFUTURE GEN AI INNOVATIONSOfficial Website : https://www.hkgen.ai/

name: The Justice Conference Asia 2025
location: The Vine Church, 29 Burrows St Hong Kong Island
about: The Justice Conference Asia returns to Hong Kong with a renewed vision and a steadfast commitment to advancing God’s heart for justice in our city and across the region. This year’s theme, Re-Imagine, invites us to challenge our imagination, disrupt our realities, and energise our actions for practical outcomes. We invite you to join us as we explore what it means to envision a world transformed by God’s boundless vision of human flourishing and justice.

location: Diocesan Boys' School Yip Kit Chuen Concert Hall, 131 Argyle Street Mongkok, KOW

name: Summer Nights @ Shaw Auditorium: Robot Dreams
location: Main Hall, Shaw Auditorium, HKUST HONG KONG, NT
about: 逸夫演藝中心誠邀您參加盛夏電影放映活動，一同欣賞溫馨感人的動畫電影《汪汪夢裡人》。本片以狗狗與機器人之間的深厚友情為主題，透過精緻的動畫畫面與電影歌曲，細膩描繪孤獨、夢想與現實交織的情感旅程。全片無對白，但每個動作與表情都勝過千言萬語。這將是一場讓您放鬆心情、感受真摯情感的觀影體驗，誠邀您蒞臨共度美好時光！Shaw Auditorium cordially invites you to a summer film screening featuring the heartwarming animated film "Robot Dreams." This touching story showcases the profound friendship between a dog and a robot, brought to life through exquisite animation and music. With no dialogue, the film conveys deep emotions through gestures and expressions. Join us for this captivating cinematic experience that promises to soothe your mind and touch your heart!故事簡介榮獲奧斯卡最佳動畫長片提名，感動橫掃全球60+項大獎及提名，被譽為媲美《優獸大都會》及《星聲夢裡人》的年度最佳電影！單身狗狗厭倦了寂寞的獨居生活，決定購買智能機械人作伴。二人一拍即合，日夜漫遊紐約大街小巷。正當他們以為找到人生中的彼此，命運卻在一次沙灘狂歡後將他們硬生生拆散。狗狗帶著思念回復孤獨的生活日常，機械人則獨自躺在沙灘上幻想著再次回到狗狗身邊……在這場無盡的思念旅程中，有沒有一個重來的機會？SynopsisBased on a graphic novel by Sara Varon, Goya-Award-winning director Pablo Berger’s first venture into animation is a colourful, vibrant and touching buddy drama. To escape solitude, Dog assembles Robot from a build-it-yourself kit. Setting off on a whimsical exploration of New York City, the new best friends develop an inseparable bond as they savour curbside hotdogs and roller-skate through Central Park. However, their friendship is abruptly brought to a halt when an accident leaves Robot stranded on a beach.備註 Remarks:本次放映之影片不設對白。 No Dialogue.電影全長103分鐘。Film Duration: 103 minutes.電影級別: I (適合任何年齡人士觀看)。Film Classification: I (Suitable for All Ages).免費入場，請預先網上報名。 Free admission. Online registration is required.請於放映前15分鐘抵達場地。 Please arrive at the venue 15 minutes before the screening.入場守則 Admission Rules:不設劃位，先到先得。Free-seating on first-come-first-served basis.場內嚴禁飲食。No food and drinks are allowed in the venue.未經許可，請勿攝影、錄音或錄影。Unauthorized photo-taking, audio or video recording is strictly prohibited.主辦單位保留更改節目、演出者及座位安排的權利。如有任何爭議，主辦單位保留最終決定權。The organizer reserves the right to make changes to the program, performers and seating arrangement. In case of dispute, the decision of the organizer shall be final.
